explanation: This is an explanation of how the app works.
help-info:
For the Padelshooter are 3 screens:

Start Here:
To start immediately with the machine and easy use. Most trainings are 1 kind of shots at 1 position with some variation. This is the easiest to learn to use the speed, spin, frequency, width, height and net.

Trainings:
Combinations of shots like bandeja - volley trainings. The volley height is set with "Net", the bandeja height with "Height". The bandeja needs more time to arrive at the player, so an extra pause could be set with "Delay".

Programs:
Make your own trainings / programs. The programs should be added to a category like "Beginner", "Advanced" or "Shot type" or "1 player", "2 players".

The machine is normally placed in horizontal middle close to back glass. But for training back and side glass balls in corner, it's also useful to place the machine at opposite corner.
The basic idea of Padelshooter is to set your preferred settings for speed, spin, frequency, width and height, when using the app for 1st time, these have standard settings and should be changed once and is remembered for each next training.
For some trainings the "net" is useful, the balls don't go below this net height. In this way you can set in random height trainings the lowest possible position with "Net", doesn't matter how low the speed is. For training at Left or Right side of court, you can select by pressing that button or both for whole court. In Trainings screen, you can set the horizontal area even smaller by selecting a % where 0% is most left and 100% is most right (seen from player).

If you have a problem, visit our website 

https://padelshooter.com/ 
In the download section for the Padelshooter 3A, there is useful information to find/solve problems.
For help and support, you can contact us (preferable by whatsapp by sending a video) at:

De Racketclub
T: 31-630974299 (also whatsapp)

Or contact your distributor.
